issue.title: [Java] ReadChannel#readFully does not set writer index correctly
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7437](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7437). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
1. The writer index should be incremented by the amount of data actually read.
2. When EOS is encounterned, the number of bytes read should be incremented before returning.
